# numberOfTapsRequired

**Instance Property**

The number of taps on the interface object that are required for the gesture to be recognized.

## Declaration

```swift
var numberOfTapsRequired: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `1`, but you can change this value when configuring the gesture recognizer in Interface Builder.

## Configuring the Gesture Recognizer

- **minimumPressDuration**: The minimum amount of time (in seconds) that the user’s fingers must be touching the interface object.
- **allowableMovement**: The maximum movement of the finger on the interface object that allows the gesture to be recognized.
